subject: Mental Health
title: Postpartum Depression
description: A short lesson to help you apply Postpartum Depression.

hook.text: A new mother holds her baby and feels nothing but dread. She's terrified to say it.

buildup.text: Postpartum depression affects roughly 1 in 7 mothers after childbirth.

discovery.text: Plummeting hormones after delivery trigger severe mood shifts in vulnerable brains.

twist.text: Shame and stigma prevent most mothers from seeking help for months.

climax.text: In 2023, the first drug specifically for postpartum depression was approved.

punchline.text: Struggling to bond doesn't make you a bad parent.

quiz.question: What fraction of mothers experience postpartum depression?
